• Fast SEO scoring algorithm
• Optimized recommendation generation
• Reduced analysis time significantly

EOF

Bash(curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/analyze -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""url"": ""https://example.com"", ""run_llm_analysis"": true}' -w "
HTTP Status: %{http_code}
Time: %{time_total}s
" --max-time 30)

Bash(curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/analyze -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""url"": ""https://example.com"", ""run_llm_analysis"": false}' -w "
HTTP Status: %{http_code}
Time: %{time_total}s
")

HTTP Status: %{http_code}
Time: %{time_total}s
" --max-time 60)
